name: Project Thief
description:
I'm working on a stealth game, currently the prototype literally only includes movement and jumping. Does it feel good? Please let me know. 

DON'T EXPECT ANY REAL GAMEPLAY FOR NOW!

The 3D assets are some of the first I've made and are there just to show some of my work. The pixelated textures are intended. Nothing is final.

I'm actively working on this project so more updates are to follow, like looting, crouching, sprint jumping, and other fitting gameplay mechanics.

There is also a secret hidden in the game world. Can you find it?
